Detailed Description

template<typename Var>
struct WatchLiteralConstraint< Var >

constraints;w-literal Description The constraint w-literal(x, a) ensures that x=a. constraints;w-literal References See also

help constraints w-notliteral

Defines the number of dynamic triggers the constraint wants. Must be implemented by any constraint.

Definition at line 61 of file dynamic_literal.h.

template<typename Var>
virtual bool WatchLiteralConstraint< Var >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
